text: Mastixiodendron is a genus of flowering plants in the family Rubiaceae. It contains the following species (but this list may be incomplete): * Mastixiodendron plectocarpum S.Darwin * Mastixiodendron stoddardii Merr. & Perry ==References== ==External links== Category:Rubiaceae genera Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Mastixiodendron
